attributes.action: Divert overseas aid to help the flood victims of the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.theweek.co.uk/refugee-crisis/63394/foreign-aid-how-does-britain-spend-its-overseas-aid-budget

News and media coverage of flooding within the UK and Ireland!
attributes.background: 11.4 billion of the UK Governments Overseas Aid Budget needs to be diverted to help flood victims of the UK to avert further disasters and misery. We the assigned agree that the UK government needs to act ASAP!
